name: Quick Math
description:
Improve your math skills with this trainer!

How many equations can you solve in a minute?

-Select the math table or tables to practice (from 0 to 11)
-Select the quantity of digits to practice (up to 4)
-Select the operations to practice (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division)
-Share your practice session results

-Change the blackboard color to green or black (high contrast mode)

Practice results color legend:
-Green: Answered correctly
-Red: Answered incorrectly
-Purple: Expected correct answer
-Yellow: Last problem, not solved (not counted)

Originally designed for for Android, adapted for web. Some features might not work.

Get the original game in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JLHM.XR.QuickMath

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JLHM.XR
